description:
This course will take you Step-by-Step learning process of how to speak Arabic language, using a common phrases and sentences that commonly used at any country, by learning it will help you to break the language barrier and make your journey more enjoyable and fun. You will learn everything you need to know while you are on the airplane, arriving at the airport, hotel, business meeting, shopping.
The course length will be no more than 92 minutes

You will also have two bonuses and one Extra especial one only for you.

Bonus #1 You will learn some business phrases and basic sentences while you are in a meeting.

Bonus #2 You will learn how to communicate at your shopping journey.

You can download pdf at every section you complete

The course length will be no more than 92 minutes

Enjoy the course
title: Arabic Language on The Move
